GameItemType.Description: The claymore is the smallest member of the two-handed swords family, but it's a fast and deadly weapon that should never be underestimated.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A greatsword of surprising quality, known to cleave through multiple opponents in a single swing without slowing its bearer to a crawl.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A mighty blade that revitalizes the wielder with each hit upon the enemy.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A mighty greatsword, enchanted with the unyielding power of ice.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A masterwork greatsword, but enchanted with fire.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A large blade with a curved, wave-y surface, a ricasso and quillons. Hard to master, but extreemy deadly in skilled hands.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: A masterwork blade of finest steel, enchanted and blessed to become a truly terrifying weapon.

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: "Blessed by a cross-section of gods, forged in times beyond memory, this legendary blade almost leaps at your enemies by itself, unleashing upon them divine retribution."

GameModifier.Provides: Sweep - strike all opponents in the vicinity

GameItemType.Description: Master-crafted armor forged from mithril. The church spared no expense to equip their greatest heroes and symbols of faith.

GameItemType.Description: Magical giant glowy stone, grant me sight beyond sight!
Apearances can be decieveing. This shirt has finely crafted leather armoring underneath and is lightly enchanted for extra defense.
Grants the wearer +1 armor, and a +5 bonus to dodge (+10 vs ranged attacks).
